properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.url
properties.description: The datasource url jobRunr uses.

properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: The datasource driver class for jobRunrs datasource.

properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.username
properties.description: The username jobRunr uses for the datasource.

properties.name: org.jobrunr.database.datasource.password
properties.description: The password jobRunr uses for the datasource.

properties.description: The datasource url qbic's identity domain uses.

properties.description: The datasource driver class for qbic's identity domains datasource.

properties.description: The username qbic's identity domain uses for the datasource.

properties.name: qbic.identity.datasource.password
properties.description: The password qbic's identity domain uses for the datasource.

properties.description: The datasource url qbic's finance domain uses.

properties.description: The datasource driver class for qbic's finance domains datasource.

properties.description: The username qbic's finance domain uses for the datasource.

properties.name: qbic.finance.datasource.password
properties.description: The password qbic's finance domain uses for the datasource.

properties.name: qbic.project-management.datasource.url
properties.description: The datasource url qbic's project-management domain uses.

properties.description: The datasource driver class for qbic's project-management domains datasource.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.salt
properties.description: The salt used to encrypt personal access tokens. A hex representation of the bytes.

properties.name: qbic.access-token.iteration-count
properties.description: The number of iterations used in personal access token encryption.

properties.name: server.download.api.measurement.url
properties.description: URL of the server from which to download the raw data from.

properties.name: openbis.datasource.as.url
properties.description: URL of the openbis application server containing the measurement information.

properties.name: openbis.datasource.dss.url
properties.description: URL of the openbis datastore server containing the measurement information

properties.name: routing.registration.oidc.orcid.endpoint
properties.description: The routing target for openid connect registration

properties.name: qbic.communication.data-manager.source-code.url
properties.description: URL of the repository hosting the source code for the data manager application.

properties.name: qbic.communication.documentation.url
properties.description: URL of the github pages instance hosting the user documentation for the data manager application.

properties.name: qbic.communication.contact.email
properties.description: Contact email address to get in touch with qbic about the data manager application.

properties.name: qbic.communication.contact.subject
properties.description: Subject String for the contact email address.

properties.name: qbic.communication.api.url
properties.description: URL of the repository hosting the information on how to interact with the data manager API.
